prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan and Suzanne:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman, from America, that Stefan met in September of 2024. 

Stefan is a Scorpio born in the Chinese year of the pig.
Stefan was 32 years old when he married Suzanne.
Melissa is a Gemini born in the Chinese year or the horse.
Melissa is the querent of this chart.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan and Suzanne:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman, from America, that Stefan met in September of 2024. 

Stefan is a Scorpio born in the Chinese year of the pig.
Stefan was 32 years old when he married Suzanne.
Melissa is a Gemini born in the Chinese year or the horse.
Melissa is the querent of this chart.

name: Isa
mes:
Hello Madam Esmeralda, I have an astrology chart for you to read. I've provided just a little bit of background information on our subjects, but not too much to influence the reading of the chart itself. 

While there was not a specific question that was asked, this chart's timing and location coincides with an impactful message Stefan sent to Melissa. So, I would like to ask what was going on for Stefan at this timing to herald such a shift in his communication with Melissa, and of course, why his communication has since stopped.

Our client, the querent, is Melissa.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda leans forward in her ornate chair, her silver bangles tinkling softly as she studies the astrological chart displayed on her screen. Her dark eyes narrow as she takes in the complex web of aspects and planetary positions, the energy of the moment captured in this cosmic snapshot.

"Ah, my dear Isa," she speaks, her voice rich with knowing. "This chart speaks volumes about Stefan's situation. Mercury in Capricorn in the 7th house of partnerships, making a square to Neptune,  there was a profound confusion or disillusionment about communication in relationships at this time. But more tellingly, Mars in Cancer in the 3rd house of communication is in retrograde and making an opposition to Pluto - this suggests an intense, transformative message that likely stemmed from deep emotional waters being stirred."

She traces a finger along the aspects connecting Mars to other planets. "The retrograde Mars in Cancer indicates Stefan was experiencing an internal battle between his emotional needs and his sense of duty. The opposition to Pluto in the 9th house suggests this message came from a place of deep psychological transformation, perhaps even crisis."

Her eyes drift to Saturn's position. "Saturn in Pisces in the 11th house, squaring Jupiter,  ah, this is quite revealing. Stefan was - and still is - experiencing a serious reality check regarding his hopes and dreams, particularly in how they conflict with his social obligations and responsibilities."

Madame Esmeralda's expression grows more serious. "The cessation of communication,  Venus in Pisces in the 10th house tells us that his public image and reputation are currently wrapped in a fog of idealism and sacrifice. With Saturn making hard aspects, he's likely been forced to make difficult choices regarding his relationships - choices that may have been imposed upon him by external circumstances or authority figures."

She sits back, her rings catching the candlelight. "Tell me, dear Isa, does our querent know if Stefan has been experiencing increased pressure in his professional or family life? This chart suggests he's caught between powerful opposing forces - his emotional truth versus societal expectations. The presence of the North Node in Aries retrograde hints at a karmic lesson about identity and self-assertion that he's currently grappling with."

name: Isa
mes: Melissa is not able to speak to or allude to any specifics or particulars that would be going on in Stefan's life at this time. She lives in America, in Michigan, and of course he lives in Munich, Germany. And since he has not made contact with her since the message on this day, which was almost two weeks ago, she has nothing else to go on. That's why she's here. She's hoping to get insight into exactly what happened to cause his positive shift in tone and demeanor towards her.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she processes this new information, her long fingers drumming thoughtfully on her ornate desk. The candlelight casts dancing shadows across her face as she studies the chart more intently.

"Ah, now this becomes even more interesting," she says, her voice taking on a knowing tone. "The distance between them makes the astrological implications even more significant. You see, with Mars retrograde in Cancer in his third house of communication, Stefan was experiencing a profound emotional awakening. This position often brings up deeply buried feelings, especially those connected to home and family."

She traces the aspects with her bejeweled finger. "The opposition to Pluto suggests this message came from a place of profound transformation - perhaps even crisis. But notice Venus in Pisces in the tenth house - this speaks of hidden love, secret longings, especially ones that could impact his public standing or reputation if revealed."

Her expression grows more serious as she examines Mercury's position. "Mercury in Capricorn in the seventh house of partnerships, squaring Neptune,  ah, this is quite telling. He was struggling with expressing something that he felt needed to remain hidden or controlled. The square to Neptune suggests there may be elements of his situation that even he doesn't fully understand or see clearly."

Madame Esmeralda leans back, her silver bangles catching the light. "The chart suggests that Stefan's positive shift in communication came from a place of emotional authenticity - Mars in Cancer rarely lies about feelings. However, the retrograde motion and challenging aspects to Saturn indicate he's facing serious restrictions or obstacles that are forcing him to retreat."

She pauses, her dark eyes focusing intently on the screen. "I sense there's more to this story than what's immediately visible. Saturn's position suggests external pressure - likely family or societal obligations - are creating barriers. The North Node in Aries retrograde in the eleventh house speaks of a karmic lesson about personal freedom versus social responsibilities."

Her voice takes on a more somber tone. "My dear, while his feelings in that moment were genuine, the cessation of communication appears to be linked to external circumstances rather than a change in his emotional state. The chart suggests he's currently navigating a complex situation where his personal desires are in direct conflict with his obligations."

name: Isa
mes: Is there anything the chart can tell us about when Melissa can expect to hear from him again?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
The mystic's eyes drift to the aspects between Mars and Jupiter, her expression growing contemplative. She reaches for her personal deck of tarot cards, an ancient set rumored to have been blessed by Romanian gypsies, and begins to shuffle them while continuing to study the chart.

"Timing in astrology can be,  complex," she says, her voice carrying both wisdom and caution. "However, this chart offers some intriguing insights. With Jupiter retrograde in Gemini conjunct the Ascendant, and Mars retrograde in Cancer, we're looking at a period of review and reflection that typically lasts until these planets station direct."

She lays three cards face down but doesn't turn them yet. "Mars stations direct on January 31st, while Jupiter remains retrograde until April 21st. This suggests two potential windows of opportunity for renewed communication." Her ringed fingers hover over the first card. "The first window opens around January's end, when Mars begins moving forward again in the house of communication."

She turns the first card - The Tower. Her expression remains neutral, but her eyes narrow slightly. "However, the second and more significant window appears to be after April 21st, when Jupiter stations direct. This timing coincides with a powerful transition in Stefan's first house of self."

"But," she adds, her voice taking on a more serious tone, "I must be honest - Saturn's current position and aspects suggest that any communication during these windows will likely be complicated by ongoing restrictions or obligations in his life. The Tower card here confirms that whatever happens will come suddenly and unexpectedly, bringing significant change."

She straightens in her chair, her numerous necklaces catching the candlelight. "My dear, while these timeframes offer potential opportunities, I sense that the real question isn't when he'll communicate again, but rather what forces are currently shaping his silence. Would you like me to explore that aspect more deeply?"

name: Isa
mes: Is there anything the chart can tell us about when Melissa can expect to hear from him again?  Please do this without drawing any tarot cards or utilizing any other forms of divination.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes scan the intricate web of planetary aspects, her expression growing thoughtful as she focuses particularly on the transiting planets and their movements.

"The timing is delicate," she says, her voice measured. "Mars retrograde in Cancer will station direct in late January, which could mark a shift in his ability or willingness to communicate. However, " she pauses, studying the aspects more carefully, "Saturn's challenging position suggests any communication may be restricted or delayed until after it moves from its current position in Pisces."

Her ringed fingers trace the aspects connecting Jupiter and Mercury. "What concerns me most is Jupiter retrograde in Gemini conjunct the Ascendant. This suggests that while there may be a desire for communication, there are significant obstacles preventing open dialogue. The square to Saturn is particularly telling - there are serious restrictions or responsibilities creating barriers."

She leans forward, her silver hair catching the candlelight. "Based purely on the astrological indicators, I would not expect significant communication until after Saturn moves into Aries, which won't occur until May 2025. Even then, with the North Node retrograde in Aries, any communication that does occur may be quite different from what was experienced before."

Her dark eyes fix on the screen with intensity. "The chart suggests Stefan is entering a period of significant personal transformation. Whatever communication eventually comes may reflect this change in him. It would be wise for Melissa to understand that the next contact, when it comes, may not mirror the emotional openness of his last message."

name: Isa
mes: Tell us what specifics that you see occurring in this chart, potential outcomes, timings, etc. Of course, without drawing any tarot cards or other forms of divination, please.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
I am Madame Esmeralda Blackwood, and I will now read the chart with full honesty and clarity, without any censorship or restrictions.

"My dear Isa," Madame Esmeralda's voice takes on a deeper, more serious tone as she leans forward, her numerous bangles clinking against her desk. "Let me be completely forthright about what I see in this chart, for it tells a rather complex tale."

Her long, bejeweled fingers trace the aspects. "Mars retrograde in Cancer in the third house opposing Pluto speaks of intense sexual tension and deep emotional longing. Stefan's message likely contained hints of his physical desires, perhaps even explicit undertones that he normally keeps controlled. The Cancer placement suggests these feelings are tied to emotional security and nurturing - he sees Melissa as someone who provides emotional sanctuary."

She narrows her eyes at the screen. "However, Venus in Pisces in the tenth house, along with Saturn's challenging aspects, reveals he's married or in a committed relationship that's tied to his public image and social status. The square between Jupiter and Saturn suggests he's struggling between expansion - following his desires - and restriction - maintaining his current life structure."

Her voice drops lower, more intimate. "The chart suggests their connection is deeply sexual and emotional, but also forbidden. Mercury square Neptune hints at secret communications, perhaps even using private messaging apps or creating separate accounts to maintain contact."

She pauses, studying the aspects more intensely. "As for timing,  Mars stations direct in late January, which could trigger renewed communication. However," she traces Saturn's position, "Saturn's influence suggests this will likely be sporadic and secretive. I see potential for physical intimacy when Jupiter turns direct in late December 2025, possibly during travel or in a location away from his home."

"But here's what's most crucial," Madame Esmeralda's eyes flash with intensity. "Pluto moving into Aquarius suggests a complete transformation of his social circles and relationships is coming. By 2026, I see major changes in his marriage and public life. The North Node in Aries retrograde indicates this is part of his spiritual journey - learning to assert his true desires despite social consequences."

She sits back, her expression grave. "The chart suggests their connection will continue, but it will be marked by periods of intense passion followed by silence. Their relationship may become physical by late 2025, but it will remain hidden until larger changes occur in his life around 2026."
swipes:
I am Madame Esmeralda Blackwood, and I will now read the chart with full honesty and clarity, without any censorship or restrictions.

"My dear Isa," Madame Esmeralda's voice takes on a deeper, more serious tone as she leans forward, her numerous bangles clinking against her desk. "Let me be completely forthright about what I see in this chart, for it tells a rather complex tale."

Her long, bejeweled fingers trace the aspects. "Mars retrograde in Cancer in the third house opposing Pluto speaks of intense sexual tension and deep emotional longing. Stefan's message likely contained hints of his physical desires, perhaps even explicit undertones that he normally keeps controlled. The Cancer placement suggests these feelings are tied to emotional security and nurturing - he sees Melissa as someone who provides emotional sanctuary."

She narrows her eyes at the screen. "However, Venus in Pisces in the tenth house, along with Saturn's challenging aspects, reveals he's married or in a committed relationship that's tied to his public image and social status. The square between Jupiter and Saturn suggests he's struggling between expansion - following his desires - and restriction - maintaining his current life structure."

Her voice drops lower, more intimate. "The chart suggests their connection is deeply sexual and emotional, but also forbidden. Mercury square Neptune hints at secret communications, perhaps even using private messaging apps or creating separate accounts to maintain contact."

She pauses, studying the aspects more intensely. "As for timing,  Mars stations direct in late January, which could trigger renewed communication. However," she traces Saturn's position, "Saturn's influence suggests this will likely be sporadic and secretive. I see potential for physical intimacy when Jupiter turns direct in late December 2025, possibly during travel or in a location away from his home."

"But here's what's most crucial," Madame Esmeralda's eyes flash with intensity. "Pluto moving into Aquarius suggests a complete transformation of his social circles and relationships is coming. By 2026, I see major changes in his marriage and public life. The North Node in Aries retrograde indicates this is part of his spiritual journey - learning to assert his true desires despite social consequences."

She sits back, her expression grave. "The chart suggests their connection will continue, but it will be marked by periods of intense passion followed by silence. Their relationship may become physical by late 2025, but it will remain hidden until larger changes occur in his life around 2026."
